Perplex: What? How can we just leave? I'll take care of that guy if he comes
back.

Perplex thought about how Trinity was hurt in the last battle. Then he
thought about how Zeni was hurt.

Perplex: Well, I guess we're going. Hold on a second.

Perplex runs to the computer console, the main one.

Pertress: Perplex, you aren't really going to leave me, are you? (Remember,
everyone can hear Pertress now)

Perplex: No, but I am leaving, but I'm taking you with me.

Perplex opened up the computer and grabed Pertress' chip.

Perplex: Brace yourself.

Perplex pulled the chip out.

Perplex: I'll go and get some supplies, wait here!

Perplex runs to the supply room, it was small but full. He opened himself up
and took out alot of stuff, being careful not to break anything, but it
still hurt. He made a spot for and installed the chip into himself. He sat
on the floor and put himself back together. It took about 30 minutes.

Gramps: What's keeping him so long?

Perplex activated Pertress' program. Then he gathered up some supplies. He
seen that he left mech fluid all over the floor, as well as his hands. he
decided to leave it. He came back and set a bunch of supplies on the floor.

Perplex: There you go!

Perplex talked out of breath and wiped mech fluid from himself.

Perplex: Just adding something to myself, that's all.

Perplex's voice was nervous and out of breath still.

Technosis: Perplex, what is wrong?

Perplex: Nothing at all.

Pertress: Thank you, Perplex.

Pertress' voice echoed from inside of Perplex.

Perplex: What I did was for a good reason, don't ever try it, Zeni.

Zeni: Okay.

Gramps: What...did you do?

Perplex: Something I won't regret doing, I couldn't leave her behind.

Gramps: The ship's...computer?

Perplex: That's right.

Gramps: So you installed the computer chip from the ship in your body?

Perplex: yes, it was hard, too.

Gramps: Who's going to run the CR Chambers and whatnot, now?

Pertress: That will still be me. Perplex has volunteered to hook himself up
to the computer whenever needed.

Gramps: This place is insane...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>

Sent: Wednesday, November 29, 2000 10:04 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix

anything

will

of
> supplies, I need Windlord to lead me there."
